Package adudecalledleo.lionutils.color

Contain classes to deal with colors.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColorUtil.ComponentModifier
    Represents a color component modifier.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorConstants
    Contains color constants.
    ColorUtil
    Helper class for dealing with colors.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColorUtil.Component
    Represents a color component.
    ColorUtil.GrayscaleStyle
    Represents what value to use when converting a color into grayscale.

Package adudecalledleo.lionutils.color Description

Contain classes to deal with colors.

All classes in this package use the ARGB color format, which is the same format Minecraft uses.

Since:
6.0.0
